key_takeaways: Solution: Create survey-based intelligence service for major platforms (Difficulty: intermediate)
Growth Tactic: Leverage existing network for data collection (Channel: community)
AI Workflow: AI-assisted data scraping for hedge fund intelligence
Strategy: Cross-section approach - combine unlikely business areas
Strategy: Reverse auction pricing for exclusive information access

startup_ideas.title: Advertising spend intelligence service for hedge funds
startup_ideas.target_market: Hedge funds investing in Meta, Google, Amazon and other ad platforms
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Lack of real-time advertising spend data for investment decisions
startup_ideas.business_model: Subscription service at $100,000-$200,000 per year or reverse auction pricing
startup_ideas.validation: Speaker made $200,000/year doing similar expert calls

startup_ideas.title: Verticalized expert networks
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Generic expert networks don't provide deep industry specialization
startup_ideas.validation: Multiple generalist networks achieved nine-figure EBITDA

market_gaps.title: Hedge funds need systematic data on advertising spend trends
market_gaps.solution_approach: Create survey-based intelligence service for major platforms

trend_opportunities.title: AI-enhanced data intelligence services
trend_opportunities.opportunity: Hedge funds don't want to be left behind on AI-assisted data
